DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare pain perception lidocaine plain aqueous gel assessment postvoid residual volume Q-tip test .
DOC.brief_title: Double Blinded Randomized Trial Between Lidocaine And Plain Gel For Urethral Straight Catheterization And The Q-Tip Test
DOC.detailed_description: This study approve institutional review board Baystate Medical Center . The study pool consist woman present single urogynecologist 's office initial consultation complaint urinary incontinence and/or pelvic organ prolapse . Those patient consent research randomize either 2 % Lidocaine Hydrochloride jelly ( Akorn , Buffalo Grove , IL ) Surgilube ( Fougera , Melville , NY ) use computer generate block 10 . The latter commonly use , commercially available aqueous lubricant gel . Both urogynecologist perform examination patient blind randomization . The appearance study gel indistinguishable . Based power analysis target power 0.80 , Î± value 0.05 , 20 % difference pain perception group , aim recruit sample minimum132 subject . First , demographic information include age , parity , previous vaginal birth , body mass index ( BMI ) , race , diabetes , vaginal atrophy , neurological impairment , current estrogen use , indication visit exam anxiety collect part patient history . Immediately void , patient place lithotomy position . An independent nurse involve patient 's care prepare study gel accord randomization . After cleanse external urethral meatus povidone iodine solution , lubricate sterile 14-French polyvinyl chloride Mentor Self-Cath catheter ( Coloplast , Minneapolis , MN ) place transurethrally bladder measure postvoid residual volume . Following removal catheter , cotton swab , lubricate allocated gel , advance urethrovesical junction resistance felt . The angle Q-tip horizontal plane measure rest Valsalva maneuver . All examination perform urogynecologist order . Immediately follow Q-tip test , patient 's perception pain level measure use validate pain score system , Wong-Baker FACES visual scale 0 represent pain 5 represent worst imaginable pain . The rest physical examination complete pain assessment . We evaluate patient characteristic pain score variable exposure either Lidocaine Surgilube use SPSS Version 11.01 software ( Chicago , Illinois ) . For continuous variable , calculate mean standard deviation evaluate significant difference use Mann Whitney U test . For categorical variable , calculate number percent evaluate significant difference use Pearson 's chi-square test . Significance result set alpha < 0.05 .
DOC.criteria: All woman present single urogynecologist 's office initial consultation complaint urinary incontinence and/or pelvic organ prolapse Being minor Pregnancy Allergy Lidocaine aqueous lubricant gel Any current use analgesia Structural abnormality urethra Active genital Herpes vulvovaginal infection inability cooperate pain assessment due mental disorder .
